blogs.title: The Open Laboratory in Nature!
blogs.summary: The blogging anthology OpenLab 2007 has received a very favourable review in the premier science journal Nature. So you don't have to take my word for it that this is a very good addition to your bookshelf. I do have a chapter in this anthology, but all th

author.name: Astroblog
author.description: Obscured by Clouds. The rough and ready blog of a cloud benighted biologist and amateur astronomer. Astroblog will cover my interests in astronomy, biology and Life, the Universe and Everything.

blogs.title: Nature Network bloggers feature in anthology
blogs.summary:
Four Nature Network bloggers feature in an anthology of selected science blog posts of 2007, Open Laboratory 2007. Out of more than 450 nominated entries, 52 were chosen for publication, including these from Nature Network bloggers: 
Deanne Taylor, a resea

author.name: Nautilus - Blog Posts
author.description: This blog is for authors and aspiring authors of Nature Publishing Group journals. Here we provide information and author-related news about Nature Publishing Group, its journals and products. We warmly welcome your feedback and comments. We answer questions from past, present and future authors; give guidance about how to publish in our journals; and provide a discussion forum for policy and other matters concerning authorship.

blogs.title: Nature Reviews The Open Lab
blogs.summary: Science über-journal Nature has published a review of The Open Lab 2007: The Best Science Writing on Blogs. Many know that I was a judge for the anthology as well as a contributor. It will be marked for distribution soon and you can buy it at bookstores in

author.name: The Other 95%
author.description: A blog highlighting the unappreciated majority of the animal kingdom. News, current research and all things invertebrate are covered, analyzed and scrutinized.

blogs.title: Buy My Book: The Open Laboratory 2007

blogs.title: Cast Away
blogs.summary: My first car was a red Ford Fiesta '89. It was squeezed to death on a rainy day in April '97 between two Mercedes Benz. Luckily the grey suit emerging out of the Benz in my back took one look at me and my Fiesta, all three of us equally sad in the pouring

author.name: Backreaction
author.description: Events on the world lines of two theoretical physicists, from the horizon to timelike infinity. A scientifically minded blog with varying amounts of entertainment, distractions, and every day trivialities.

blogs.title: Open Lab reviewed by Nature

author.name: Mind the Gap
author.description: Nature Network blog posts from user 'Jennifer Rohn'
